column4: thank hlst0 i have hooked up a drive to ubuntu but i cant see it...
a 200gb hard disk with one ntfs partition on it
is that ubotu sleeping or what?
how comes there's no automount in ubuntu yet???
hey guys i have plugged in a new hard drive, bios can see it but fdisk -l doesnt show it.... what am i doing wrong?
sudo dmesg|grep sdb yields nothing at all
really weird... the bios could see the device
is it on a SATA/SCSI bus?
seems the system is not detecting the drive at all
